about_the_game:
Witch’s Lewd Curse is an adult, explicit visual novel set in a mystical realm brimming with intrigue, romance, and monster girls. You play as an ordinary man who’s been cursed by the powerful Witch, Velina, forcing you to collect lewd energy in order to break free. To lift the soul-binding spell, you’ll explore diverse regions, build intimate bonds, and indulge in sensual encounters with an array of bewitching monster girls—all while trying to uncover Velina’s hidden motives.

Key Features:

  • Romance & Seduction: Form deep connections with monster girls, each with unique personalities, difficulty levels, and explicit storylines.

  • Daily Cycle & Progression: Manage your time across morning, afternoon, evening, and night to explore, complete quests, and strengthen relationships.

  • Adult Content: Immerse yourself in a raw, uncensored world that blends fantasy and lust. All characters featured are consenting adults aged 18+.

This demo will help you learn more about how the visuals and gameplay are, but, won't include the majoraty of the final game scenes.
